extension_description.message: Isandiso sokubheka iphasiwedi sikusiza ukuthi uhlangule ama-akhawunti aye athintwa ukuphulwa kwedatha.

extension_detailed_description.message:
Noma kunini lapho ungena khona ngemvume, uma ufaka igama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi engasaphephile ngenxa yokuvela ekuphulweni kwesivumelwano esaziwayo ku-Google, uzothola isexwayiso. Sicela usethe kabusha iphasiwedi yakho. Uma usebenzisa igama lomsebenzi nephasiwedi efanayo kunoma imaphi amanye ama-akhawunti, sicela usethe kabusha iphasiwedi yakho nalapho futhi.

Ukuhlolwa kwephasiwedi kwakhiwe ngobumfihlo engqondweni. Ayilokothi ibike noma iluphi ulwazi olukhombayo olumayelana nama-akhawunti akho, amaphasiwedi, noma idivayisi. Siyalubika ulwazi olungaziwa mayelana nenombolo yokubheka okuveza imininingwane engaphephile, noma ngabe isexwayiso siholela ekushintshweni kwephasiwedi, kanye nesizinda esibandakanyekayo ukuthuthukisa ukumbozwa kwesayithi. Ungafunda kabanzi mayelana nendlela ukubheka okusebenza ngayo ku-https://support.google.com/accounts?p=password-checkup.

Manje ngenxa yokuthi Ukubheka Iphasiwedi kufakwe ku-Chrome, sizoshonisa Isandiso sokuhlola iphasiwedi ngomhla ka-31 Agasti 2020. Ngemva kwale dethi, Isandiso Sokuhlola iphasiwedi sizokhutshazwa futhi ngeke kusaba nombiko kungaba yigama lomsebenzisi noma iphasiwedi eye yaba sekwephulweni kwesivumelwano sedatha. Ukuze baqhubeke nokuthola izexwayiso, abasebenzisi kufanele kunalokho bangene ngemvume ku-Chrome. Abasebenzisi kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi i-Chrome isesimweni sakamuva nokuthi isethingi lokuvikeleka le-Chrome elithi 'Ukukuxwayisa uma amaphasiwedi wakho edalulwe ekwephulweni kwesivumelwano sedatha' linikwe amandla (ngokuzenzakalelayo ngaphandle kwalapho uma like lashintshwa ngaphambilini).

Ngokufaka le nto, uvumelana nokuthi Imigomo Yesevisi ye-Google kanye nokuthi Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ku-www.google.com/policies/.

feedback_notice.message: Hamba kukhasi losizo lwezomthetho ukuze ucele ushintsho lokuqukethwe lezizathu zezomthetho. Olunye ulwazi lwe-akhawunti nolwesistimu lungathunyelwa ku-Google. Sizosebenzisa ulwazi osinikeza lona ukuze usisize sibhekane nenkinga yobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthuthukisa amasevisi ethu, ngokuya ngenqubomgomo yobumfihlo yethu kanye nemigomo yesevisi.

feedback_thanks.message: Siyabonga ngempendulo. Manje ungavala leli khasi.

feedback_tooltip.message: Chaza inkinga yakho noma yabelana ngemibono yakho. Sicela ungafaki noma iluphi ulwazi olungakhomba umuntu siqu noma imininingwane yokuqinisekisa njengengxenye yale mpendulo.

popup_default_status_message.message: Awekho amaphasiwedi owafake kamuva aye watholwa ekuphulweni kwedatha.

popup_ignored_status_message.message: Awekho amaphasiwedi owafake kamuva aye watholwa ekuphulweni kwedatha. Lokhu akubandakanyi amaphasiwedi angaphephile okhethe ukiziba ukuwasetha kabusha.

popup_multiple_accounts_warning_status_m.message: Isandiso sokubheka iphasiwedi sithole ukuthi ama-akhawunti angu-$1 alandelayo anamaphasiwedi angasaphephile ngenxa yokuphulwa kwedatha.

popup_one_account_warning_status_message.message: Isandiso sokubheka iphasiwedi siye sathola ukuthi i-akhawunti engu-1 elandelayo inephasiwedi engasaphephile ngenxa yokuphulwa kwedatha.

popup_opt_out_anonymous_reporting_text.message: Khetha ukuphuma ekubikeni okungaziwa kwalokhu kufakwa kwesandiso?

popup_reset_extension_text.message: Sula yonke idatha yesandiso. Lokhu kuzosusa lonke ulwazi olulondoloziwe mayelana namaphasiwedi angaphephile namasayithi azitshwe ngaphambilini.

popup_turndown_message.message: Manje ngenxa youkuthi Ukubheka Iphasiwedi kufakwe ku-Chrome, lesi sandiso sizoyeka ukusebenza ngomhla ka-31 Agasti 2020.

turndown_notice.message: Manje ngenxa yokuthi Ukubheka Iphasiwedi kufakwe ku-Chrome, sizoshonisa Isandiso sokuhlola iphasiwedi ngomhla ka-31 Agasti 2020. Ngemva kwale dethi, Isandiso Sokuhlola iphasiwedi sizokhutshazwa futhi ngeke kusaba nombiko kungaba yigama lomsebenzisi noma iphasiwedi eye yaba sekwephulweni kwesivumelwano sedatha. Ukuze baqhubeke nokuthola izexwayiso, abasebenzisi kufanele kunalokho bangene ngemvume ku-Chrome. Abasebenzisi kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi i-Chrome isesimweni sakamuva nokuthi isethingi lokuvikeleka le-Chrome elithi 'Ukukuxwayisa uma amaphasiwedi wakho edalulwe ekwephulweni kwesivumelwano sedatha' linikwe amandla (ngokuzenzakalelayo ngaphandle kwalapho uma like lashintshwa ngaphambilini).

warning_text.message: Isandiso sokubheka iphasiwedi sithole ukuthi iphasiwedi yakho ye-$1 ayisaphephile ngenxa yokuphulwa kwedatha.
